text: We have actually had a few employees move over to the regulatory department.... reason being is a lot of chemists look to be a QP who will sign off a product so we can sell it. Without a QP we cannot distribute so they are very important people and have very high salaries.
To be a QP you need experience in all kinds of departments (lab, regulatory, quality assurance, sometines even warehouse) hence why they move around departments a lot
